item.name: Iron War Fishing Rod
entries: This war fishing rod is made of iron, which allows better control and range.
The range of any spell you cast using this war fishing rod is increased by 10 ft.
You have a +1 on every attack roll made with this war fishing rod.
Every spell you cast with this war fishing rod has its DC increased by 1.

item.name: Boots of Feral Leaping
entries: The boots are made from thick brown hide and appear to be suited for cold weather.
If the wearer of the boots passes a DC 16 Dexterity ({@skill Acrobatics}) check, they can jump either 15 ft. vertically, or 20 ft. horizontally, as a bonus action.
However, if they fail the check, they fall {@condition prone}.

item.name: Wand of Cure Wounds
entries: This wand has 12 charges.

While holding it, you can use an action to expend 1 or more of its charges to cast the {@spell Cure Wounds} spell from it (using +0 as your spellcasting ability modifier if your class does not have one).
For 1 charge, you cast the 1st-level version of the spell.
You can increase the spell slot level by one for each additional charge you expend.
The wand regains {@dice 1d6 + 1} expended charges daily at dawn.
If you expend the wand's last charge, roll a {@dice d20}. On a 1, the wand crumbles into ashes and is destroyed.

item.name: Wand of Lesser Restoration
entries: This wand has 4 charges.
While holding it, you can use an action to expend 1 or more of its charges to cast the {@spell Lesser Restoration} spell from it.
For 1 charge, you cast the 2nd-level version of the spell.
You can increase the spell slot level by one for each additional charge you expend.
The wand regains {@dice 1d3} expended charges daily at dawn.
If you expend the wand's last charge, roll a {@dice d20}. On a 1, the wand crumbles into ashes and is destroyed.

spell.name: Freezing Hands
entries: As you hold your hands with thumbs touching and fingers spread, a thin sheet of ice shoots forth from your outstretched fingertips.
Each creature in a 15-foot cone must make a Dexterity saving throw. A creature takes {@damage 3d6} cold damage on a failed save, or half as much damage on a successful one.
The cold freezes nonmagical liquids in the area that aren't being worn or carried.

entriesHigherLevel.name: At Higher Levels
entries: When you cast this spell using a spell slot of 2nd level or higher, the damage increases by {@dice 1d6} for each slot level above 1st.

monster.name: Skeleton Ice Wizard
languages: unerstands all languages it spoke in life but can't speak

spellcasting.name: Spellcasting
headerEntries: The skeleton ice wizard is an 4th-level spellcaster. Its spellcasting ability is Intelligence (spell save {@dc 13}, {@hit 5} to hit with spell attacks). The skeleton ice wizard has the following wizard spells prepared:

action.name: Scepter
entries: {@atk ms} +4 to hit, reach 5 ft., one creature. {@h}4 ({@damage 1d4 + 2}) bludgeoning damage.
